attributes.action: Petition for Rishi Sunak to Return to Frontline Political Leadership
attributes.additional_details: Rishi Sunak showed strong leadership and fiscal responsibility during difficult times, helping stabilize the UK economy and restoring confidence. His calm, pragmatic approach is needed again to bring stability and unity amid ongoing political challenges. We urge the Government and Parliament to support his return to frontline politics so he can help guide the nation towards a secure, prosperous future.
attributes.background: We ask the Conservative Party and political leaders to welcome Rishi Sunak back to a frontline leadership role. His steady leadership and economic expertise are needed now to restore stability, unity, and confidence for the UK’s future.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
